Wind exposure map

areas with high wind exposure in LeafletJS and WMS.

Wind exposure map

Wind exposure opacity:
× To view this page loading load unsafe scripts are required. For more information please click here.

Enable untrusted content

In case of Google Chrome, open terminal and start it with the following command:

google-chrome --allow-running-insecure-content

Please make sure to close every chrome instance before, otherwise chrome will just start a new tab in the current session.

  • Map information
  • Application:
  • LeafletJS
  • Base map:
  • MapBox
  • Layer(s):
  • WMS (from GeoServer) + KML as GeoJSON
  • Purpose:
  • Show the areas with high wind exposure and key infrastructure.

Created with the Jekyll static site generator, written in the Ruby programming language. The site generation is implemented in the Liquid template language. Hosted on Github Pages, the layout is based on Bootstrap and jQuery and inspired by the Clean blog Bootstrap theme by David Miller.
